items.content_html: NewsApp is a simple and lightweight mobile application that provides users with the latest news articles from various categories, such as Technology, Business, Sports, Health, and more. The app fetches real-time data from news APIs and presents it in a user-friendly format.
items.title: prakritipiyusha/NewsApp: NewsApp is a simple and lightweight mobile application that provides users with the latest news articles from various categories, such as Technology, Business, Sports, Health, and more. The app fetches real-time data from news APIs and presents it in a user-friendly format.

items.content_html: Develop a lightweight backend indexer to monitor and index key liquidation parameters for accounts interacting with the aUSDC contract on Aave. The focus is to track Health Factor (HF) and flag accounts with HF < 1.0 for liquidation risk.
items.title: lovesharma95/aave-indexer: Develop a lightweight backend indexer to monitor and index key liquidation parameters for accounts interacting with the aUSDC contract on Aave. The focus is to track Health Factor (HF) and flag accounts with HF < 1.0 for liquidation risk.

items.content_html: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient file-sharing application built with React, Express, and WebSocket. This project enables real-time file transfer between users over WebSocket, ensuring seamless and fast communication.
